TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpPostClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol

summary.span: 使用 HTTP-POST 协议的 XML Web services 客户端代理的基类。

span.span: The base class for XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP-POST protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web service 客户端使用 HTTP POST 协议, 则默认情况下, 使用 URL 编码规则在 HTTP 正文中对参数进行编码, 并使用纯 XML 来响应。When an XML Web service client uses the HTTP-POST protocol, by default parameters are encoded within the HTTP body using URL encoding rules and uses plain XML for the response. 此协议使用派生自的类将参数编码并将值返回到标准的 MIME 格式。This protocol uses classes that derive from to encode parameters and return values into standard MIME formats. 在服务说明中指定要使用的编码器。The encoders to use are specified in the service description. 如果使用 ASP.NET 生成 XML Web service 客户端, 则需要为要调用的 XML Web service 创建间接或直接派生的代理类。If you are building an XML Web service client using ASP.NET, then a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from needs to be created for the XML Web service you want to call. 当 XML Web service 客户端使用 HTTP 调用时, 派生代理类, 后者反过来派生自。 When the XML Web service client is calling using HTTP, derive the proxy class , which in turn derives from . 和派生自, 它提供对使用 HTTP GET 和 http POST 调用 XML Web service 方法的支持。 and derive from , providing the support for calling an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST respectively. 使用 SOAP 调用 XML Web service 的客户端应派生自。Clients calling an XML Web service using SOAP should derive from . 有关生成代理类的详细信息, 请参阅[创建 XML Web Services 代理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/d2s8y7bs(v=vs.100))。For details on building a proxy class, see [Creating an XML Web Service Proxy](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/d2s8y7bs(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例是一个由 wsdl.exe 实用工具为`Math`以下 XML Web service 生成的代理类。The following example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for the `Math` XML Web service below. 代理类派生自抽象类, 后者派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例是`Math`从其创建上一个代理类的 XML Web service。The following example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the previous proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Net.WebRequest GetWebRequest(class System.Uri uri) cil managed

span.span: The to use when creating the .

summary.span: 为指定的 URI 创建一个 实例。

span.span: Creates a instance for the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写的基版本, 以指定使用 http POST 对 XML Web service 发出 http 请求。This method overrides the base version of to specify that the HTTP request to the XML Web service is made using HTTP-POST. 通过重写此方法, 您可以在发出 XML Web service 请求之前自定义对象。By overriding this method, you can customize the object before the XML Web service request is made. 例如, 可以将自定义标头添加到请求。For example, you can add a custom header to the request.

span.span: The parameter is null or has a length of zero.
